description: This file, note_service.py, provides functions managing notes, including listing, retrieving, creating, updating, and deleting notes from a database. It acts as a service layer interfacing with the database and Note model.

methods.name: list_notes()
methods.description: Returns all notes ordered by latest updated timestamp.

methods.name: get_note(note_id: int)
methods.description: Retrieves a note by its ID.

methods.name: create_note(title: str, content: str)
methods.description: Creates a new note with a title and content, setting timestamps to current UTC.

methods.name: update_note(note_id: int, title: str = None, content: str = None)
methods.description: Updates the title and/or content of an existing note, updates the timestamp.

methods.name: delete_note(note_id: int)
methods.description: Deletes a note by its ID.

ctags.name: update_note
ctags.pattern: /^def update_note(note_id: int, title: str = None, content: str = None):$/
ctags.signature: (note_id: int, title: str = None, content: str = None)
